mapper.insert: insert into `t_custom_address` (custom_id, contact_name, contact_tel, province_code, city_code, district_code, address_prefix, address_desc, mark, latitude, longitude, create_time, update_time, default_status) values (#{customId}, #{contactName}, #{contactTel}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{districtCode}, #{addressPrefix}, #{addressDesc}, #{mark}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{defaultStatus})
mapper.update: update `t_custom_address` set custom_id = #{customId}, contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_tel = #{contactTel}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, district_code = #{districtCode}, address_prefix = #{addressPrefix}, address_desc = #{addressDesc}, mark = #{mark}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, default_status = #{defaultStatus} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, custom_id, contact_name, contact_tel, province_code, city_code, district_code, address_prefix, address_desc, mark, latitude, longitude, create_time, update_time, default_status from `t_custom_address` where id = #{id}

select id, custom_id, contact_name, contact_tel, province_code, city_code, district_code, address_prefix, address_desc, mark, latitude, longitude, create_time, update_time, default_status from `t_custom_address`
